file-changes.explanation:
The following changes have been made to the file_changes.py:
1. Added QCheckBox to the imports from PyQt6.QtWidgets. 2. Modified the FileChangeWidget class to include a checkbox: - Added a checkbox_toggled signal to emit when the checkbox state changes. - Created and styled a QCheckBox with a white border. - Added the checkbox to the layout at the leftmost position. - Connected the checkbox's toggled signal to emit the checkbox_toggled signal with the file path and state. 3. Updated the FileChangesList class: - Connected the new checkbox_toggled signal to a parent method called toggle_file_change. - Added a placeholder toggle_file_change method that should be implemented in the parent class.
These changes add checkboxes to the left of each file change item with a white border. The checkbox state changes are now emitted to the parent class for further processing.
